code: import React from"react";import"./stats.css";import{useStats}from"./util";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Stats=props=>{const{currentPhase,phasesSum,CompletionDate}=props;const{getFormattedDate}=useStats(CompletionDate);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:phasesSum&&CompletionDate?`${currentPhase} of ${phasesSum} tasks completed, estimated completion time is ${getFormattedDate()}`:""})});};export default Stats;
